website_summaries.verdict: A quick and easy to use nail formula that produces quality results without breaking the bank.
pros: The Nutra Nail formula is not a polish, but rather an oil that you massage into your nail-beds and cuticles
We enjoyed how convenient it was to apply throughout the day
It takes no skill or effort – you can apply mindlessly as you watch TV
There was a noticeable difference in nail length within a few days, but more than that our cuticles felt hydrated and soft

customer_reviews.title: Nailed it!
customer_reviews.text: It works! You won't go from numbs to talons, but you will get results. I applied it a lot. Maybe 10 times a day or more. I kept it with me and applied it whenever I thought about it. Sometimes I rubbed it into my entire nail and sometimes I gave my cuticle a generous swipe. These pictures were taken exactly 7 days apart. UPDATE: Pictures with pink polish are after one month of use. I apply it 2 or 3 times a day to my cuticles.
customer_reviews.author: AlabamaBarbie

customer_reviews.title: It had a little impact.
customer_reviews.text: I always take anything that promises miracles worth a grain of salt. But I can give you the results of my personal "experiment". I lost an entire toenail due to injury. It's growing back, but will obviously take a long time. I bought this and used it only on the lost nail as it was regrowing, because why not try? My toes are painted and so I can see how much they grow. The nail I used this on grew about a mm longer in 2 weeks than the one on the other foot. Not a drastic improvement, but it did appear, in my case, to help a little.
customer_reviews.author: Tisiphone

customer_reviews.title: DON'T LISTEN TO THE GOOD REVEIWS
customer_reviews.text: This product is very expensive nail polish. It does absolutely NOTHING in the way of strengthening nails. It chips off easily. I purchased and tried (1) dozen products. THE ONLY PRODUCT THAT WORKS IS "Mavala Scientifique." It penetrates nails, and is full of harmful chemicals, so you are warned not to allow it to touch your skin -- so you KNOW it's got to be good. After 2 weeks of MAVALA, my nails are back to me being able to play piano without splitting, bending, chipping. Buy MAVALA. I am not a spokesperson for this company, although I OUGHT to be getting their product for free with my great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as stated
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for 20 days now and missed one day in between. I am not satisfied with this product as it does not do as stated. My nails still chip, break and crack easily. They have not grown any quicker than they would normally without Nutra Nail. I fully followed directions and around the 16th day I started using 3 times a day and had same results. Only real difference I see and feel is they have a small, hint of a shine now but most likely from product itself.
customer_reviews.author: TadofDAT

customer_reviews.title: Persistence pays with nails
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Been using for a couple weeks, and I definitely see some improvement. I have had a long standing thin, peeling nails which are improving, and a thumbnail vertical split that’s closing. I use several times a day. I don’t think just 1-2x a day will help very thin, weak, peeling nails. Nails grow only a few millimeters a day; takes about 6-8 weeks for complete nail to grow out. Don’t expect instant results.
customer_reviews.author: Atlantic Aviator

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff!! I’ve been a nail biter since I was 2 years old and have quit several times and have used this product to grow my nails quickly. I bite when highly stressed, so this comes in handy getting my nails to grow back fast. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this before. I got it to help my nails grow out from the damage of the fake nails I had on. It works great and I can see a difference too. UPDATE:::: 09/28/2018 after using this for a few months with oral pills (hair skin and nails pills) these are my results. (Pics are new) now they were a little longer but I work with my hands so I keep clipping them.
customer_reviews.author: Keah Burton

customer_reviews.title: Useful for rough cuticles
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today, and I really like how it goes on. It creates a film that dries, but not like a nail polish. It can be painted on the skin, so on the whole cuticle area, and it seems to make that area more smooth. I'm trying to grow out healthier cuticles so I'm finding this quite helpful. This is much better than nail strengtheners that are high-gloss polishes.
customer_reviews.author: A Kelley

customer_reviews.title: a nail biter review
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because i used to use an older style nutra nail and i am currently trying to kick a very bad nail biting habit. It only takes a couple days for my nails to regrow and it makes me not want to chew them because they look good. here is to hoping i can kick this habit.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Lanham

customer_reviews.title: it really didn't help my fingernails but I am one ...
customer_reviews.text: it really didn't help my fingernails but I am one of the rare people that nothing works for my thin peeling nails other then using a brush on nail glue and trust me, I have tried it all. Please keep in mind though, just because it didn't work for me, doesn't mean it won't work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Louder

customer_reviews.title: Nutra Nail  hardner
customer_reviews.text: My wife had her French manicure done which had the rounded tips painted white. After it grew out and she clipped her nails, her nails were extremely brittle. She has used this product in the past and it worked beautifully. She recommends this product.
customer_reviews.author: topgun

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this before and works really well for my this, splitting nails when used as directed. Absorbs quickly. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: kathyrn

customer_reviews.title: I used to get this stuff at the local grocery ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to get this stuff at the local grocery store and it really helped with my nails. Because I could no longer find it at the stores I ordered it here. It no longer really seems to make any difference. Maybe it's lost its efficiency because my body has adjusted or maybe its not the same formula. I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Joy C

customer_reviews.title: It works great !!
customer_reviews.text: This really works . I used it for many years ! It’s basically vitamins for your nails !’ Absorbs into the nails !! In a week you can tell the difference in your nails !! Will definitely buy again !
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B.

customer_reviews.title: Nails are in better shape
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many products for nails, but this one works! You need to be diligent and put it on twice a day, and don't polish your nails...which I always did, but this has been worth it. Told 2 people at work about it, and now they are using it also, and getting great results.
customer_reviews.author: J Stanciu

customer_reviews.title: 1 month
customer_reviews.text: not in 7 days but it really does work, and heals damaged nails!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Marie Burgess

customer_reviews.title: My favorite nail product
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, brittle nails amlnd this is th only product I've found that works. When used as directed, my nails are longer and stronger. This is not a nail polish, so don't expect to see any hue or shine. This is a treatment absorbed by the nail. Its become difficult to find, which is disappointing, but its definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nutra Nail REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! I’ve had gel nails and dipping powder for years and decided to give my nails a break. They were weak, thin and brittle from the drills that were used. 3 months of consistent use with Nutra Nail and I have strong healthy nails. I use it several times a week and rub it into my nails and cuticle and under my nails. I am very happy with this product and would highly recommend it. The pictures are from October when I started, December and today Jan 9th.
customer_reviews.author: NEducator

customer_reviews.title: Wow it works!
customer_reviews.text: This product works as described! I had nubs now I have decent size nails and they are strong too. For best results, I used twice a day with no polish. Nail polish damages my nails
customer_reviews.author: sophie miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I can not keep nail polish on my finger nails do to such flimsy nails. The polish chips off regardless what type I use. Nutria nail is brushed on and is absorbed by my nails making them stronger. I bought 2 bottles so I'd always will have a bottle near me. With prompt delivery, it meant I could use it even sooner. I will by this again.
customer_reviews.author: chenley

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great! I've had a terrible habit of bitting my ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great! I've had a terrible habit of bitting my nails for years and i used this twice in a day for the first time and i saw results!! they grow so fast with this miracle polish and i wouldn't never thought! DEFINELTY recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!  Really works!!
customer_reviews.text: When I could not find this at drug stores anymore I turned to Amazon and was thrilled to see it available. ALL the Nutra Nail Products I have used are great. Just can't find them anywhere in town anymore though.

customer_reviews.title: I also have a bad habit to pick at my nails when I get ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really seem to be doing anything. Kind of made my nails softer. But I think it may just be my nails. I also have a bad habit to pick at my nails when I get anxious.

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Within a week, my nails were strong, healthy, & smooth after several years of weak, splitting nails. I am very happy with this product

customer_reviews.text: I bought this after trying everything at the drugstore that claimed to make nails stronger. Nothing worked, but I love that this soaks into the nails. My nails really do feel stronger after 1 week of use. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: It really worked!

I had literally no nails because I would bite them. (so my nails were not strong at all) I started using this, stopped biting them & they really got stronger. If you want longer nails that won't break as they grow-this product is for you!

customer_reviews.title: Works! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, quick drying time. It's not like polish that has to dry forever. I've used it for 2 weeks with great results! I use it more than the standard 2 times a day. I keep it at my desk, anytime I have a few mins I'll apply it. It stays at work so I don't use it on weekends. This growth is over a 2 week period. Def recommend. I feel like my nails are pretty strong too, no chipping.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product

Fast-forward to now. My nails are the strongest they’ve ever been and they look amazing. I had to make sure I gave this product the review it deserves.

customer_reviews.text: The box came torn like this and the bottle was too easy to open, it was like it was opened before i got it.

The good thing is that since I'm a guy it doesnt look like I'm wearing nail polish or anything since it is matte and doesn't seem to have the buildup of similar nailpolishes.

customer_reviews.title: Yassss
customer_reviews.text: By recommendation I started using this after I had dip powder on my nails. I used it several times a day for about a week and could definitely tell the difference. Would recommend after gel or dip nails to help strengthen and grow out your nails.

customer_reviews.title: That it apparently works.

product_meta.title: Nutra Nail 5 to 7 Day Growth Calcium Formula, 0.50 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:0.45 Fl. Oz (Pack of 1)For soft, weak nails. Helps soft, weak nails grow stronger! Fast absorbing calcium, protein & vitamin formula. As seen on TV. Customized nail care. Nail Type: Soft, weak. Fragile edges split and crack. No strength. Bend and tear easily. Nail Needs: 5 to 7 Day Growth Calcium Formula: Unlike other products that just coat the nail, this calcium-rich growth formula with protein and multi-vitamins penetrates into soft, weak nails. It instantly provides vital nutrients your nails need for strong, healthy growth. You'll see soft, weak nails grow longer and stronger in just 5 to 7 days. Manufactured in the USA.
feature_bullets: Nutra Nail Calcium Formula 5 to 7 Day Growth helps soft, weak nails grow stronger with visible results in 5 to 7 days.
Nails become well conditioned to stop them from peeling and breaking as they grow.
It works on contact, absorbing quickly into the nails as vital nutrients and moisture is restored.
Country of origin is United States
